title: How to connect my Raspberry Pi to my computer via USB - Quora

response.answer_text: See Connect PC to Pi via USB? The PI has “USB On the Go” which is what the USB ports on mobile phones are. It can act as a USB device when plugged into a host, but each model PI is a little different, and you might need to configure it right, and you might need a special cable. My question is why would you want to do this? You can communicate between a PI and another computer with ethernet or WiFi.
How do I connect my Raspberry Pi to my computer via USB? Use an ethernet cable and configure the networks.
